title: Software Developer - Full Stack Engineer
subHeading: ~ Serving as a contractor for the product-based company, Optum (UHG)
points: Applied DSA Algorithm to enhance search and caching mechanisms.
Integrated Jenkins for CI/CD Pipelines of REST APIs and Microservices.
Wrote unit test cases using Jest to ensure code quality and reliability.
Successfully managed a team, fostered collaboration, and drove project success.
Managed tasks and user stories using Rally following Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Designed and implemented scalable microservice with load-balancing and scaling strategies.
Improved application performance by 20% and reducing API response time by 30% through caching.
leveraging MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), Java, Jenkins, Azure, Salesforce, Kubernetes, Dynatrace, SonarQube.
